summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of a triangular portion of Government Lot 5, Section 16-24-4, bounded by Columbia Way, Snoqualmie Street and 16th Avenue South, with respect to Use, Height and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto three new sections numbered 2-239, 10-14 and 17-185, respectively.
